title: And I cried
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture actors and actresses
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures
Music & Performing Arts/Motion picture actors and actresses
description: We live in a world besieged and besotted by image. Everyone, it seems, wants their fifteen minutes and plenty of people will do whatever it takes to get a piece of the celebrity cake. "And I cried" is a film about wishing to be a movie star. Being a star is about shining bright, a brilliant flash of light against a velvety black night sky. "And I cried" is an exploration, a celebration, a lamentation, of our obsession with the star and the image. Cast includes: Cassandra Tytler, Engelbert Schmidl, Dominic Redfern, Shane Hennessey.
